title: MiaoChat怎么禁止玩家使用彩色字
author: fred2006
txt_content: MiaoChat怎么禁止玩家使用彩色字

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 给玩家 -MiaoChat.color 权限 负号记得带上

replies.author: 远远困了
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 YuanYuanOwO 于 2020-7-12 14:05 编辑 

 MiaoChat.color
这个权限关掉就好用luckperms的话
直接
lp group builder permission set miaochat.color false就好

replies.author: 喵
replies.txt_content: 彩色字是mangaddp 权限组名 -MiaoChat.color
